thread.title: Joseph Wales: Poorest man in richest suburb of Point Piper
thread.title_full: Joseph Wales: Poorest man in richest suburb of Point Piper | DailyTelegraph

author: ROBBIE PATTERSON
title: Joseph Wales: Poorest man in richest suburb of Point Piper
text:
JOSEPH Wales is probably the poorest person living in Australia’s richest suburb. Mr Wales has lived in a cobbled-together “igloo” on the beach at Rose Bay, in Sydney’s exclusive eastern suburbs, for about 20 years.
He is self-sufficient in his home of old plywood covered in synthetic turf, with a camp stove and radio.
Mr Wales says he has become part of the furniture in the past 20 years. Picture: Daniel Aarons
The kayak centre Mr Wales says he is the “caretaker” of. Picture: Facebook
The makeshift home Mr Wales has made for himself using a range of items.
This is the view Mr Wales wakes up to every day. Photo: Simon Chillingworth
The homes in the streets around Mr Wales “igloo” are some of Sydney’s best real estate. Picture: Google Maps
1 of n
